page.title: 03Warrenby - New Industry
page.content:
Langbaurgh District Council has recently converted the Sir Hugh Bell Bungalows in Warrenby into 12 small workshops to be known as Sir Hugh Bell Court, Warrenby. These workshops form the first part of a light industrial estate.
Each workshop is approx.409 sq. ft and is fitted with a roller door.
The rent of a workshop is Â£55 a month with the first three months free. The workshops are:-
1. R.T.Eng. 2. Joiners 3. Stall Holder 4. Aqua Outdoor Motor 5. Vacuum Repair 6. Auto Tools 7. Photographers 8. Fish Merchant 9. Vacant 10.Flack Jackets 11.Flack Jackets 12.Motor Fitter
